definition: mutually related karma (idiom); fates are intertwined/interdependent

sentences.english: This paper introduces and analyses David Bohm s causal interpretation of quantum potential and his viewpoint of nonlocality.
sentences.chinese: 本文评介了玻姆的量子势因果解释及非定域性观点。

sentences.english: And then all this earthquake happened, I thought, is that Karma?-when you are not nice that bad things happen to you.
sentences.chinese: 然后地震发生了，我当时就想，这难道是因果报应？

sentences.english: Carnap tried to define causality from the angle of semantics.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔纳普试图从语义学角度来定义因果必然性。

sentences.english: Like the simplicity, and the directness of this idea.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢简单，直接因果关系的这种想法。

sentences.english: It is difficult to not find a causal relationship.
sentences.chinese: 发现不出这样的因果关系是很困难的。

sentences.english: Scientifically minded people believe in a "case-and effect" relationship.
sentences.chinese: 具有科学头脑的人相信“因果”关系。

sentences.english: Attribution theory is an umbrella term for various theories that attempt to explain these processes. Fritz Heider first proposed a theory of …
sentences.chinese: 归因理论就是关于人们如何进行因果关系解释的理论。

sentences.english: The law of cause and effect is such a subtle thing that no ordinary person can fully explain it.
sentences.chinese: 因果定律深妙难思，凡夫是不可能说得清的。

sentences.english: There was no cause and effect between the Heaven and Earth Society and the Lin Shuangwen Uprising.
sentences.chinese: 天地会与林爽文起义之间没有直接的因果关系。

sentences.english: Drag onto the page to add a fish frame for cause-and-effect or fishbone diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 拖到绘图页后，可以为因果图或鱼骨图添加鱼骨框架。

sentences.english: He was a believer in dualism for both fatalism and causality.
sentences.chinese: 他是因果与宿命的二元论者。

sentences.english: The Buddha has always warned us against karmic retribution.
sentences.chinese: 佛说因果报应丝毫不爽。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the pragmatic approaches to bridging assumptions, the Result and Reason interpretations of bridging.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了语用照应的推想方法和语用照应因果论。

sentences.english: Our belied on causation is just our habit in mind.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信因果关系只是我们头脑中的习惯。

sentences.english: All things are subject to the law of cause and effect.

definition: chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
constant (math.)/quota/fixed number (e.g. of places on a bus)/fixed quantity (e.g. load of truck)/destiny
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 輪迴|轮回[lun2 hui2]
karmic hindrance (buddhism)/karmic consequences that stand in the way of enlightenment/(term of abuse, especially toward the younger generation) devil spawn/(fig.) money
